K10D0356_H0364:342a-0: @342a / /'phags pa zla ba'i snying pos zhus pa'i mdo las /
K10D0356_H0364:342a-1: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gnas pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:342a-3: sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa ri kha rhi thag gi steng na bzhugs te /
K10D0356_H0364:342b-0: de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor @342b dang bcas pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:342b-10: bdud sdig can la sogs pa mthu bo che thams cad tshogs pa de'i dus na /
K10D0356_H0364:342b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i zhal gyi
K10D0356_H0364:342b-12: smin mtshams nas 'od zer shar gyi lus 'phags dang
K10D0356_H0364:342b-14: nub kyi ban glang spyod dang /
K10D0356_H0364:342b-15: byang gi sgra mi snyan dang /
K10D0356_H0364:342b-16: gling 'di bzhir 'od zer kun du khyab par bkram ste /
K10D0356_H0364:342b-17: 'od zer btang ba de'i tshe ri rab la sogs pa ri chen po dang /
K10D0356_H0364:342b-22: grags grog kun la'ang snang bar mnyam ste /
K10D0356_H0364:342b-23: lag mthil dang 'dra bar gling bzhi car snang bas gsal bar gyur /
K10D0356_H0364:342b-24: 'od zer de dag las sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kha dog dang /
K10D0356_H0364:342b-25: dbyibs sna tshogs 'od dang bcas pa phal po che byung ba /
K10D0356_H0364:342b-28: klu la sogs pa sems can mang po kun gyis mthong sta ngo mtshar du gyur to //
K10D0356_H0364:342b-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la bee
K10D0356_H0364:342b-30: shra wa na la sogs pa rgyal po chen po
K10D0356_H0364:342b-31: bzhis gsol pa / 'od zer 'di lta bu de
K10D0356_H0364:342b-32: ci'i don du mdzad pa lags zhes zhus pa las
K10D0356_H0364:342b-33: bzhis gsol pa / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0356_H0364:343a-0: nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu gling bzhir ngas gsungs pa'i dam @343a *//
K10D0356_H0364:343a-1: pa'i chos kyi gsung rab dang /
K10D0356_H0364:343a-3: gzugs brnyan 'di lta bu dag 'byung ste /
K10D0356_H0364:343a-4: 'di khyed kyi lag tu gtad kyis srungs shig /
K10D0356_H0364:343a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying pos gsol pa /
K10D0356_H0364:343a-7: 'di lta bu'i thugs rje chen pos bcom ldan 'das
K10D0356_H0364:343a-8: mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos
K10D0356_H0364:343a-9: rgyal po chen po dag la gtad pa shin tu
K10D0356_H0364:343a-10: ngo mtshar to // snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas
K10D0356_H0364:343a-11: mya ngan las 'das nas dgung lo bdun lags nas
K10D0356_H0364:343a-12: dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan nub na /
K10D0356_H0364:343a-13: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa mya ngan las 'das
K10D0356_H0364:343a-14: pa'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos ji tsam gyi bar
K10D0356_H0364:343a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 'di lta bu'i chos zhus pa legs so //
K10D0356_H0364:343a-19: nga mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos kyi
K10D0356_H0364:343a-20: gzugs brnyan lo nyis stong du gnas par 'gyur ro
K10D0356_H0364:343a-21: // byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i snying pos gsol pa /
K10D0356_H0364:343a-23: dam pa'i chos 'di tha mar ji ltar nub par 'gyur /
K10D0356_H0364:343a-27: nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu lo lnga
K10D0356_H0364:343a-28: brgya'i bar du nga'i bstan pa la spyod pa'i sems
K10D0356_H0364:343b-0: can rnam par grol ba mang du 'gyur @343b ro;
K10D0356_H0364:343b-1: ;de nas lo lnga brgya'i bar du ting nge 'dzin
K10D0356_H0364:343b-2: la spyod pa mang du 'gyur ro //
K10D0356_H0364:343b-5: sems can phal rnams kyang dam pa'i chos la dad cing spyod pa'ang phyir zhing nyung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0356_H0364:343b-6: de nas lo lnga brgya'i bar du dam pa'i chos ston cing sems can 'dren pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:343b-7: thar bar byed pa'i slob dpon mang du 'byung ngo //
K10D0356_H0364:343b-8: nyan thos dgra bcom pa ni nyung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0356_H0364:343b-11: sems can phal rnams kyang nyan pa tsam du zad de /
K10D0356_H0364:343b-12: nyams su len cing spyod pa'am /
K10D0356_H0364:343b-15: dam pa'i chos kyi srungs ma rnams kyang mi dga' bar 'gyur te /
K10D0356_H0364:343b-16: dam pa'i chos la ma dad pa'i sems can rnams ni sngon pas mthu stobs skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0356_H0364:343b-17: 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi'i rgyal po rnams kyang phan
K10D0356_H0364:343b-18: tshun gcig la gcig dmag 'dren cing 'khrug par 'gyur
K10D0356_H0364:343b-19: ro // bdud kyi ris kyang 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0356_H0364:343b-20: de nas yang lo lnga brgya'i tshe lo sum brgyar
K10D0356_H0364:343b-21: ni dam pa'i chos la gnas pa'i lha klu la
K10D0356_H0364:343b-22: sogs pa sems can srungs ma rnams mi gnas shing
K10D0356_H0364:343b-23: dam pa'i chos gang du dar bar 'gro bar 'gyur
K10D0356_H0364:343b-24: / sems can chos la ma dad par 'gyur; sems
K10D0356_H0364:343b-25: can chos spyod pa rnams kyang chos kyi gzhung bzhin
K10D0356_H0364:343b-26: / mi spyod / brtson 'grus chung bas grub pa nyung bar 'gyur /
K10D0356_H0364:344a-1: ro la sogs pa'ang chung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0356_H0364:344a-5: lo nyis brgyar ni dge slong yang chos bzhin mi spyod /
K10D0356_H0364:344a-8: snying rje chung zhing khrims la mi gnas /
K10D0356_H0364:344a-9: dam pa'i chos tshul bzhin spyod pa rnams la ni glan ka tshol zhing skur pa 'debs /
K10D0356_H0364:344a-12: 'jig rten gyi rgyal po'i gsang la rten cing rgyal srid 'dzin /
K10D0356_H0364:344a-13: rgyal po'i phrin pa'i pho nyar ngo 'phral tshol zhing 'gro /
K10D0356_H0364:344a-18: dam pa'i chos spyod pa'ang snying nas nyams su blangs te mi spyod kyi /
K10D0356_H0364:344a-20: 'phral gyi tshul 'chos pa'i ya ma bral byed de /
K10D0356_H0364:344a-21: de'i dus na chos la dga' ba'i lha klu thams
K10D0356_H0364:344a-22: cad kyis rgyal khams kyi dge slong 'di ltar spyod
K10D0356_H0364:344a-23: pa'i sa gzhi bor te mi gnas shing /
K10D0356_H0364:344a-24: bdud kyi ris la sogs pa chos kyi bgegs kyi ris rnams der 'byung ste /
K10D0356_H0364:344a-28: blon po la sogs pa dad pa 'bri /
K10D0356_H0364:344a-29: dge sdig gi dmigs mi phyed /
K10D0356_H0364:344a-31: dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor dang /
K10D0356_H0364:344b-0: dge 'dun gyi rdzas la spyod cing rku 'phrog byed @344b de sdig la mi 'dzem /
K10D0356_H0364:344b-2: mchod rten rnams khad kyis bshig /
K10D0356_H0364:344b-4: de'i tshe dam pa'i chos ma nor bar spyod pa dge slong dang /
K10D0356_H0364:344b-5: khyim pa 'ga' 'ga' tsam gnas pa de'i bsod nams
K10D0356_H0364:344b-6: kyis yul phyogs su char chu dus su 'bab cing
K10D0356_H0364:344b-7: lo legs / mi rgyags la nad nyung zhing yul bde ba dag kyang bar 'ga' 'byung /
K10D0356_H0364:344b-8: de lta bu mi gnas pa phal cher ni sdug bsngal mi bde ba sna tshogs 'byung /
K10D0356_H0364:344b-9: de'i dus su rgya gar dang /
K10D0356_H0364:344b-10: rgya ma yin pa'i rgyal po chen po gsum 'byung ste /
K10D0356_H0364:344b-15: 'di gsum dam pa'i chos mi spyod /
K10D0356_H0364:344b-18: byang gi yul khams mang po zhig 'bebs par byed de /
K10D0356_H0364:344b-19: de nas yul khams de'i mchod rten dang /
K10D0356_H0364:344b-20: gtsug lag khang la sogs pa yang bshig cing mes bsregs te /
K10D0356_H0364:344b-22: dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor la sogs pa'ang brogs shing bcom ste /
K10D0356_H0364:344b-23: rgyal po 'di gsum gcig la gcig gnod pa sna tshogs kyis 'thab mo byed de /
K10D0356_H0364:344b-24: gsum car gyi rgyal srid mi bde bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0356_H0364:344b-25: de'i rjes la rgyal po de gsum nang srid gcig tu byas nas dmag mang po 'dus te /
K10D0356_H0364:344b-26: rgya gar gyi yul chu bo gang g'a'i tshu rol gnad ra dang /
K10D0356_H0364:344b-27: ma ddya de sha la sogs pa'i yul phrogs nas bzung /
K10D0356_H0364:345a-1: dus na chu bo gang g'a'i pha rol lho phyogs kyi rgyud na /
K10D0356_H0364:345a-2: yul ko'u sh'am b'i zhes bya ba'i rgyal po ma
K10D0356_H0364:345a-3: he na dra se na zhes bya ba de la
K10D0356_H0364:345a-5: de'i ming ni ngu sbra sa hasta zhes bya ste /
K10D0356_H0364:345a-6: smin mtshams na lcags kyi sme ba zhig yod pa /
K10D0356_H0364:345a-7: lag pa gru mo man chad khrag gis bskus pa zhig 'byung ngo //
K10D0356_H0364:345a-8: de dang dus gcig tu rgyal po de'i blon po lnga brgya la'ang khye'u lnga brgya btsa' ste /
K10D0356_H0364:345a-9: ril gyis lag pa mkhrig ma man chad khrag can du 'byung ste /
K10D0356_H0364:345a-10: de'i dus na rgyal po'i rta la rte'u smra shes pa zhig skyes te /
K10D0356_H0364:345a-13: rte'u smra shes pa skyes pa'i nub mo'ang nam mkha' las khrag gi char pa bab nas /
K10D0356_H0364:345a-14: rgyal po ma he na dra se nas drang srong
K10D0356_H0364:345a-15: gi mkhan po lnga mngon par shes pa zhig la
K10D0356_H0364:345a-17: rtag la ya mtshan 'di lta bu byung ba dang /
K10D0356_H0364:345a-18: khrag gi char pa bab pa 'di ci'i ltas zhes smras pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:345a-20: khyod kyi bus 'dzam bu'i gling gis gzhi 'di mi'i khrag gis gsher bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0356_H0364:345a-21: de'i 'og tu khyod kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling gi
K10D0356_H0364:345a-22: rgyal po chen po byed par 'gyur ro zhes smras
K10D0356_H0364:345a-23: so // rgyal bu de thog ma btsas nas lo bcu gnyis lon pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:345a-24: de'i tshe rgyal po ya ba na dang /
K10D0356_H0364:345a-26: sha ku na gsum 'dus pa'i dmag gsum 'bum rgyal po dang bcas te /
K10D0356_H0364:345b-0: @345b rgyal po ma hen dra se na'i yul du drangs pa las /
K10D0356_H0364:345b-1: yul du dmag phal mo che byung bas rgyal po snying mi dga' ste /
K10D0356_H0364:345b-2: mya ngan byed cing 'dug pa la bu ngu spras ha stas pha la dris pa /
K10D0356_H0364:345b-3: yab; 'di ltar thugs mi dgyes pa ci las gyur ces zhus pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:345b-5: rgyal po gsum gyi dmag byin chen po bdag cag
K10D0356_H0364:345b-6: gi yul du byung bas mi dga' zhes smras pa
K10D0356_H0364:345b-7: dang / bus smras pa; yab; mi dgyes su ma mdzad cig /
K10D0356_H0364:345b-8: dmag 'di bdag gis thub par bgyi'o zhes bgyis pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:345b-12: blon po'i bu ya mtshan can lnga brgya la sogs te /
K10D0356_H0364:345b-13: dmag nyis 'bum bcas te btang nas 'thab mo byas pa'i tshe /
K10D0356_H0364:345b-14: smin mtshams na lcags kyi sme ba yod pa bskyed
K10D0356_H0364:345b-15: nas lus ril lcags su byas nas rab tu khros
K10D0356_H0364:345b-17: du spra hasta'i dmag rgyal te phyir log pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:345b-19: bu; khyod kyis rgyal po gsum gyi dmag 'di lta
K10D0356_H0364:345b-20: bu dang 'thab mo byas pa las rgyal ba legs
K10D0356_H0364:345b-21: so // da phyin chad khyod kyis rgyal srid zungs shig /
K10D0356_H0364:345b-22: nga ni 'byung ngo zhes bsgo nas rgyal srid kyang bu la byin no //
K10D0356_H0364:345b-23: de nas lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du rgyal po
K10D0356_H0364:345b-24: gsum gyi dmag dang 'thabs pa las dmag dpon yang
K10D0356_H0364:345b-25: ril gyis gtubs / rgyal po gsum yang bzung nas med par byas so //
K10D0356_H0364:345b-26: de tshun chad 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po chen po byas par gyur to //
K10D0356_H0364:346a-1: blon po rnams la smras pa /
K10D0356_H0364:346a-2: nga 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po chen po byed pa ni dga' na /
K10D0356_H0364:346a-3: gud na mi dga' ba zhig kyang yod ces smras pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:346a-4: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
K10D0356_H0364:346a-5: ci mi dkyes zhes zhus pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:346a-6: sems can mang po 'di snyed cig bsad pa sdig che bas mi dga' na /
K10D0356_H0364:346a-7: sdig 'di ji lta bu zhig tu byas nas sus 'byang bar 'gyur zhes smras pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:346a-8: blon po rnams kyis gsol pa /
K10D0356_H0364:346a-9: yul pa ta li pu tra ste dmar bu can
K10D0356_H0364:346a-10: zhes bya ba na chos kyi mkhan po sde snod
K10D0356_H0364:346a-12: bram ze aag ni da ti pu tra ste mes byin gyi bu zhes bya'o //
K10D0356_H0364:346a-13: ming ni shi shya ka ste /
K10D0356_H0364:346a-14: slob ma can zhes bgyi ba zhig dgon pa'i gnas
K10D0356_H0364:346a-15: na gnas pa de spyan drangs nas mchod bkur bgyis
K10D0356_H0364:346a-16: na sdig pa 'byang rngo thogs so zhes gsol pa
K10D0356_H0364:346a-17: dang / rgyal po'ang dgyes nas dge slong shi shya
K10D0356_H0364:346a-18: ka'ang 'gugs pa btang nas rgyal po'i drung du 'ongs
K10D0356_H0364:346a-19: dang / so // de nas mkhan po shi shya ka la rgyal pos phyag byas te /
K10D0356_H0364:346a-21: bdag gis sdig byas pa rnams cis 'byang bar 'gyur zhes gsol pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:346a-23: rgyal po chen po dkon mchog gsum la lo bcu
K10D0356_H0364:346a-24: gnyis kyi bar du mchod cing skyabs su song na
K10D0356_H0364:346a-25: sdig rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang
K10D0356_H0364:346a-26: / de nas rgyal po du sbras ha stas pho nya mang po phyogs bcur btang ste /
K10D0356_H0364:346a-27: 'dzam bu'i gling na dge slong 'dug go cog bkug ste /
K10D0356_H0364:346b-0: @346b 'dzam bu'i gling gi dge slong ri la 'ongs te /
K10D0356_H0364:346b-1: chu bo gang g'a'i pha rol yul ko'u sha ma
K10D0356_H0364:346b-2: b'i'i rgyal po du spras hasta'i gnas ga la ba
K10D0356_H0364:346b-3: der bsdus pas 'dzam bu'i gling gi yul khams gzhan
K10D0356_H0364:346b-5: dge slong dag med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0356_H0364:346b-6: dge slong bsdus pa de'i tshe na lam du dge slong gyag cing chud zos pa'ang mang ste /
K10D0356_H0364:346b-7: rgyal po'i pho brang du ni 'bum tsam zhig phyin par 'gyur ro //
K10D0356_H0364:346b-8: dge slong lam du gyag cing chud zos pa'ang gcan gzan sna tshogs dang /
K10D0356_H0364:346b-10: chu la sogs pas phal khyer te chud zos so //
K10D0356_H0364:346b-11: dge 'dun mang po phyin pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:346b-13: yon phul te mchod pa byas so //
K10D0356_H0364:346b-14: de'i tshe dge 'dun rnams gcig la gcig gtam du smras pa /
K10D0356_H0364:346b-15: khyed kyi mkhan po ga re /
K10D0356_H0364:346b-16: slob ma gar song; grogs po khrims zla ga re zhes so sor gtam du glengs pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:346b-19: mi rgod kyis bsad pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:346b-21: nad kyis btab nas shi ba la sogs pa'i gtam
K10D0356_H0364:346b-22: byas nas dge slong so so nas mya ngan langs
K10D0356_H0364:346b-23: te ngud mos 'debs te brang rdung ngo //
K10D0356_H0364:346b-24: de nas de'i tshe rgyal pos mya ngan ma bgyid ma du zhes bsgo ba dang /
K10D0356_H0364:346b-25: dge 'dun rnams ma nyan pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:346b-26: rgyal po'ang mi dga' nas kha phyogs te nyal lo //
K10D0356_H0364:346b-27: nyal ba'i tshe smon lam du btab pa /
K10D0356_H0364:346b-28: gang zag gi dge 'dun la ni skyabs su song nas mchod pa byas na /
K10D0356_H0364:347a-2: bdag gis dgra bcom pa zhig gi zhal mthong bar shog cig ces smon lam du btab pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:347a-3: 'jig rten gyi lha zhig gis rmi ltas su bstan pa /
K10D0356_H0364:347a-4: gan dha m'a de na ste spos ngad ldang zhes
K10D0356_H0364:347a-5: bya ba'i ri la su dha na pu tra rarna
K10D0356_H0364:347a-6: sha ste tshong dpon nor bzang gi bu zhes bya
K10D0356_H0364:347a-7: ba rab tu byung ba su ra ta ste des
K10D0356_H0364:347a-8: pa zhes bya bar ming btags pa dgra bcom pa'i
K10D0356_H0364:347a-9: 'bras bu thob pa zhig bzhugs te /
K10D0356_H0364:347a-10: de spyan drangs nas bsnyen bkur byas te /
K10D0356_H0364:347a-11: de la sdig bshags na sdig kyang 'byang /
K10D0356_H0364:347a-12: the tshom yang bral bar 'gyur ro zhes lhas bstan pa rmis pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:347a-13: rgyal po sad pa dang 'phral du pho nya bkye ste /
K10D0356_H0364:347a-14: spos ngad ldang gi ri las dgra bcom pa su ra ta spyan drangs te /
K10D0356_H0364:347a-15: rgyal po'i pho brang du byon pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:347a-16: rgyal pos kyang tshul bzhin du phyag byas shing mchod de bsnyen bkur byas so //
K10D0356_H0364:347a-17: de'i dus na tshes bcu bzhi'i nub mo dge 'dun ril gyis 'dus pa'i nang nas /
K10D0356_H0364:347a-18: dge slong gsar zhugs rnams kyis sde snod gsum shes
K10D0356_H0364:347a-19: pa'i mkhan po shya ka la pr'a ti mo ksha
K10D0356_H0364:347a-24: rna ba med na me long ci dgos /
K10D0356_H0364:347a-26: 'dul ba bshad kyang khyed 'dul ba ltar mi spyod /
K10D0356_H0364:347a-27: tshul khrims mi bsrung ba la 'dul ba bshad kyang ci phan zhes smras pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:347b-0: de'i tshe su ra ta zhes bya ba dgra bcom pas seng ge'i sgra byung @347b nas smras pa /
K10D0356_H0364:347b-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshul khrims ngas mnos
K10D0356_H0364:347b-2: nas da tsam gyi bar du rtsva mchog tsam yang
K10D0356_H0364:347b-3: ma nyams na / 'di skad ma zer bar pr'a ti mo ksha thon cig par smras pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:347b-4: mkhan po shi shya ka'ang dgra bcom par ngo shes
K10D0356_H0364:347b-5: te rab tu skyengs nas cang mi zer ba dang
K10D0356_H0364:347b-6: / shi shya ka'i slob ma dge slong aam ga
K10D0356_H0364:347b-7: da ste dpung gi tshogs 'jigs su rung zhes bya
K10D0356_H0364:347b-8: ba de 'khor 'dug pa'i nang nas langs te su
K10D0356_H0364:347b-9: ra ta zhes bya ba dgra bcom pa de la
K10D0356_H0364:347b-10: khyed ci ste nga'i mkhan po la de skad smra
K10D0356_H0364:347b-13: nga'i mkhan po sde snod gsum la mkhas pa de
K10D0356_H0364:347b-14: la ci'i phyir kha zlogs zhes khros nas sgo gtan
K10D0356_H0364:347b-15: blangs te / dgra bcom pa brdegs nas bsad do //
K10D0356_H0364:347b-16: de'i tshe chos la dga' ba'i gnod sbyin da dhi
K10D0356_H0364:347b-17: mu kha zho gdong dir rga mu kha zhes bya
K10D0356_H0364:347b-18: bas lag par rdo rje thogs nas mngon du byung
K10D0356_H0364:347b-19: ste / dge slong aam ga da la /
K10D0356_H0364:347b-20: ci ste dgra bcom pa bsad ces zer te rdo rje phyung nas bsad do //
K10D0356_H0364:347b-21: de'i dus na dge slong gi rad ces bya bas mkhan po shi shya ka brdegs te bsad do //
K10D0356_H0364:347b-22: de nas de'i rjes la dge 'dun ril gyis 'khrugs
K10D0356_H0364:347b-23: nas gcig gis gcig bsad de gcig kyang ma lus
K10D0356_H0364:347b-24: so // de'i dus na nam mkha' la lha klu
K10D0356_H0364:347b-25: la sogs pa chos kyi srung ma phal po che
K10D0356_H0364:347b-26: ma dga' nas dus pa'i mchi ma ni khrag dang
K10D0356_H0364:348a-2: nam mkha' dag ni ser dang /
K10D0356_H0364:348a-6: skar ma dh'u ma ke tu zhes bya ba lus
K10D0356_H0364:348a-7: las du ba nag po gtong ba zhig byung nas
K10D0356_H0364:348a-9: zla ba la sogs pa 'od kyang med /
K10D0356_H0364:348a-10: gcig kyang bltar mi snang bar 'ong ngo //
K10D0356_H0364:348a-11: de'i dus na sum cu rtsa gsum gnam gyi lha dang /
K10D0356_H0364:348a-12: yum m'a y'a de b'i la sogs pa 'khor phal
K10D0356_H0364:348a-13: mo che dang der 'ongs nas dge 'dun gyi gos
K10D0356_H0364:348a-14: tshon can ril gyis bsdus nas khyer bar 'ong ngo
K10D0356_H0364:348a-15: // de'i dus na rgyal pos 'di lta bu'i ku
K10D0356_H0364:348a-16: co sgra chen po byung ba ci las gyur ces
K10D0356_H0364:348a-17: // smras pa dang / dge 'dun 'khrugs nas gcig
K10D0356_H0364:348a-18: gis gcig bsad par gyur to zhes gsol pa dang
K10D0356_H0364:348a-19: // smras pa dang / / rgyal po mi dga' ste /
K10D0356_H0364:348a-20: langs nas tho rangs mkhar gyi phyi rol gyi lha khang du phyin pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:348a-21: dge 'dun la la ni mgo bcad /
K10D0356_H0364:348a-23: la la ni rkang lag bcad de /
K10D0356_H0364:348a-24: de ltar sna tshogs su shi ba mthong nas /
K10D0356_H0364:348a-26: shi shya ka sde snod gsum shes pa'i mkhan po'i ro btsal nas gnyis ka'i ro snyed pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:348a-27: mchan khung g-yas g-yon du bzhag nas dgra bcom pa
K10D0356_H0364:348a-28: ni nga'i pha yin; shi shya ka ni chos kyi
K10D0356_H0364:348a-29: mdzod yin / 'di gnyis 'das par gyur pa ni da phyin cad nga'i lus dang /
K10D0356_H0364:348b-0: rgyal srid kyang su 'dod pa la sbyin no zhes @348b smras pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:348b-1: mig kyang ldongs te mi snang bar gyur te /
K10D0356_H0364:348b-2: de'i dus na blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la snying brtse ste /
K10D0356_H0364:348b-3: mya ngan bsang ba'i phyir mi lnga brgya bande ltar bcos te /
K10D0356_H0364:348b-5: kha spu breg tu spu gris ma chod nas /
K10D0356_H0364:348b-8: tshon sna brgya yang de'i che nub pas bande lnga
K10D0356_H0364:348b-9: brgya yang chos gos mi bdog nas phyugs nag po
K10D0356_H0364:348b-10: dang / dmar po'i ko ba gyon te /
K10D0356_H0364:348b-11: bande ltar bcos nas rgyal po'i drung du 'ongs so //
K10D0356_H0364:348b-12: blon pos rgyal po la bande lnga brgya 'ongs so zhes gsol pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:348b-13: rgyal po dga' nas mig phye ste bande dag la brtags na /
K10D0356_H0364:348b-14: bande yang ril gyis phyugs kyi pags pa gos su gyon la /
K10D0356_H0364:348b-16: kha spu ma bregs par mes bsregs pa ni ma mthong nas rgyal po yang dga' ste /
K10D0356_H0364:348b-17: dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i yo byad 'on cig ces bsgo nas bande de rnams la mchod de /
K10D0356_H0364:348b-18: bande rnams la rgyal pos zhib tu brtags na /
K10D0356_H0364:348b-19: phyugs kyi pags pa chos gos su gyon la /
K10D0356_H0364:348b-21: kha spu ma bregs par mes bsregs pa gsal bar
K10D0356_H0364:348b-22: mthong nas rgyal po nyid som nyi ru gyur te
K10D0356_H0364:348b-23: / 'di dag dge slong ni ma yin mod kyi /
K10D0356_H0364:348b-24: bdag gis cung zad cig dri'o snyam nas dge slong gi lta ba dang /
K10D0356_H0364:348b-25: tshul khrims gang yin zhes dris na /
K10D0356_H0364:348b-26: de rnams gang gis kyang dge slong gi lta ba dang /
K10D0356_H0364:349a-0: brtul zhugs cung zad kyang mi shes @349a *//
K10D0356_H0364:349a-1: pas rgyal po de la lan ma btab par cang mi smra bar 'khod pa dang /
K10D0356_H0364:349a-3: da ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa nub ste /
K10D0356_H0364:349a-4: dkon mchog gsum gyi tshul yang dag par rgyun chad
K10D0356_H0364:349a-5: pa lta zhig snyam nas rgyal po yang mya ngan
K10D0356_H0364:349a-6: chen po langs te du bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0356_H0364:349a-7: de nas rgyal po des bande phal po che btungs
K10D0356_H0364:349a-8: te shi ba'i ro rnams blangs te bsregs nas mchod
K10D0356_H0364:349a-9: pa byas te / de'i 'og tu rgyal po nyid
K10D0356_H0364:349a-10: kyang bstan pa nub pa'i thugs ngan gyis zhal 'tshos
K10D0356_H0364:349a-11: pa byas te / te 'das so // de'i tshe
K10D0356_H0364:349a-12: de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling gi dam pa'i chos
K10D0356_H0364:349a-14: gsung rab kyi yi ge rnams kyang dung byis pa bzhin du bltar mi mngon par gyur to //
K10D0356_H0364:349a-21: kha zas ni ro drug yod pa la mngar ba dang /
K10D0356_H0364:349a-23: lan tshva'i ro la sogs pa ni nub bo //
K10D0356_H0364:349a-25: bska ba gnyis ni lus so //
K10D0356_H0364:349a-26: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la 'phags pa zla ba'i snying pos zhus pa'i mdo las /
K10D0356_H0364:349a-27: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas bstan pa gnas pa dang /
